description: Instantly kill an opponent piece. Killing the king is checkmate.
Instantly pull a piece one square towards you.
Instantly push a piece one square away from you.
Instantly cause an opponent piece to move randomly to an empty adjacent square.
Instantly destroy an empty tile, so it cannot be occupied for the rest of the game.
Shrink a piece for 3 rounds. Shrunk pieces can move but cannot capture. Counter spell for engorgio.
Your opponents next spell will have no effect.
Target piece will become invisible for 2 rounds.
Enlarge a piece for 3 rounds. Enlarged pieces cannot be captured. Counter spell for reducio.
Capture any piece as long as it is 2 squares away. This piece dies afterwards.
General counter spell. Remove all spell effect on a piece.
Instantly push a piece two squares away from you.
Target piece cannot move for the next 2 rounds.
Target piece cannot move for the next 3 rounds.
Target piece will be invisible for the next round.
Instantly moves any piece on the board to any empty square.
Target piece cannot move for the rest of the game.
Capture any piece so long as it is adjacent.
Instantly cause an opponent piece to move randomly to an empty adjacent square.
Control the target piece for the next 3 rounds.
Control the target piece for the next round.
Reveal all cards in play.
Reveal your opponents entire hand.
Opponent cannot see you cast a spell.
Repair a broken tile.
Use the last spell performed by either side.
Shield a piece from the next spell. Lasts 3 rounds.
Target piece cannot move for the next round.
